1.1 Creating Simple Features

wp_nga <- read_csv("data/aspatial/wpdx.csv")

1.1.2 Geospatial Data

Both sets of geospatial data are imported with the correct CRS of 26392.

geoNGA = st_read(dsn="data/geospatial/geoboundaries_nga", 
                 layer = "geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM2") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 26392)
Reading layer `geoBoundaries-NGA-ADM2' from data source 
  `D:\bellekwang\IS415\inclass_ex\ICE2\data\geospatial\geoboundaries_nga' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 774 features and 5 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2.668534 ymin: 4.273007 xmax: 14.67882 ymax: 13.89442
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
NGA <- st_read("data/geospatial/NGA_cnty_admin2",
               layer = "nga_polbndl_adm2_1m_salb") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 26392)
Reading layer `nga_polbndl_adm2_1m_salb' from data source 
  `D:\bellekwang\IS415\inclass_ex\ICE2\data\geospatial\NGA_cnty_admin2' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 1685 features and 1 field
Geometry type: LINESTRING
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2.744192 ymin: 4.363015 xmax: 14.57926 ymax: 13.90103
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
